summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1804, for the improvement of Utah Avenue, from the south line of Connecticut Street to the south line of Hanford Street, and Hanford Street, from Utah Avenue to First Avenue South, by replanking the same, under Ordinance No. 18710 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
